text: Jörg Kukies (born 21 February 1968) is a German economist and politician. In November 2024, he became Minister of Finance in the government of Chancellor Olaf Scholz. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Finance ministers of Germany Category:German economists Category:Politicians from Rhineland-Palatinate Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:People from Mainz
title: Jörg Kukies
